## AsyncRetryConsumer.eachBatch() method

Wraps the provided handler with a handler that will provide some extra callback functions for dealing with message processing errors and retries

**Signature:**

```typescript
eachBatch(handler: TAsyncRetryConsumerBatchHandler): EachBatchHandler;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter

</th><th>

Type

</th><th>

Description

</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

handler

</td><td>

[TAsyncRetryConsumerBatchHandler](./kafka-uroboros.tasyncretryconsumerbatchhandler.md)

</td><td>

your batch handler that will be provided with a few extra parameters relevant to the async retry process

</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

EachBatchHandler

- a standard batch handler that can be passed to a KafkaJS consumer instance
